segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how oblivious the woman is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying dishes while the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are right behind her, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s always this unaware of her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging off the stool to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised the stool hasn’t tipped over yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so absurdly funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stop smiling at the ridiculousness of it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
